commandDescription: Creates a parcel (package) using git diff
branchFlagDescription: The branch other than remotes/origin/master to diff against
inputdirFlagDescription: The root directory to compare other than the force-app default
outputdirFlagDescription: The output directory to store the Metadata APIâ€“formatted metadata files in. Default: './parcel'
includedestructiveFlagDescription: If provided and there are destructive changes you will not be asked if you want to include them
destructivetimingFlagDescription: Allows you to indicate if you want to process the destructive changes before or after the deployment. options: before, after
errorCouldNotConvertToPackage: SFDX failed to convert the copied files to a metadata package. See above for details.
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
errorNoGitRepo: Your current directory does not have a git repo setup.
errorNoGitRemote: Your current directory does not have a remote git repo set. Specify a local branch or config a remote repo.
